1.title: Scandinavian Modern?

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: In Cambridge, Mass., the crew turns the inside of a dark, divided 1887 two-family home into an open, Scandinavian-style one-family.

2.title: Deconstruction and Design

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot:

3.title: Modernizing a Balloon Frame

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Swedish Style

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Varying ceiling height; designers show how Scandinavian modern style evolved from more rustic Swedish country interiors; framing upgrades; installing a new skylight.

5.title: Landscape Plans, Roof Deck

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Combining traditional and modern elements in landscape.; getting rid of steps to a roof deck by dropping the structure into the second floor ceiling; using a chainsaw and stump grinder kn a Norway maple stump.

6.title: Exterior Improvements

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: The old brick foundation is re-pointed; rowing on the Charles River.

7.title: Old and New in Harmony

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The existing concrete front walk is replaced; architect Michael Kim discusses planning modern houses inside the shells of old ones; how modern and traditional can live in harmony.

8.title: Plaster, Shingles, Radiant Heat

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: A 60-year veteran of the plastering trade; Norm and Tom match an old staggered shingle pattern; a sneak peek at Scandanavian modern interior design; radiant heat and the boiler go in.

9.title: Installing Gutters and a Fireplace

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Painters put up a tinted primer with airless sprayers; trimming out the double-hung windows; custom copper gutters are installed; a fireplace specialist.

10.title: Swedish Design Details

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Installation of Southern yellow pine boards on the ceilings for architectural interest; PVC porch boards and a customized railing system complete the roof deck; pre-finished maple flooring; a custom cap for the roof deck railing.

11.title: Window Seat, Stairs and a Painted Ceiling

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: A new window seat is made to fit into an old bay window; maple stair treads are installed; a custom newel cap made from southern yellow pine; a whitewash stain with a lacquer finish makes the ceiling look Swedish.

12.title: Dry Wells, Kitchen Design, Deck Tiles

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Two lightweight plastic drywells are used to deal with water coming off the roof; cabinetry details and custom wood create a Scandinavian-inspired kitchen; a new thermostat that learns habits and preferences; the old deck is covered with deck tiles.

13.title: Hearthstone and Butcher Block Island

episode of.title: This Old House: Trade School (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: A stone specialist uses Italian sandstone to achieve a rustic finish; a state-of-the-art Pennsylvania shop for woodworking minds; a butcher block top for the kitchen island is made with a joinery technique called a dovetail key.

imdb.plot outline: See what it's like to work alongside the pros and learn the tricks of the trades. THIS OLD HOUSE: TRADE SCHOOL, hosted by Kevin O'Connor, is a celebration of craftsmanship, vocational education, and excellence in the field of home improvement. This new series follows two residential construction projects and will offer viewers a master class in building methods and disciplines through step-by-step instructions demonstrated by the industry's leaders. Exploring everything from architecture, engineering and carpentry to plumbing, masonry and landscape design, THIS OLD HOUSE: TRADE SCHOOL will provide insight into the tricks of the trade from experts and professionals, as they renovate and restore America's homes from top to bottom.
imdb.title: This Old House: Trade School
